text: Singha Durbar (; translation: Lion's Palace) is a palace in capital city of Nepal, Kathmandu. It was built by Chandra Shumsher in June 1908. It was highly damaged by April 2015 Nepal earthquake. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Nepal Category:1908 establishments Category:20th-century establishments in Nepal Category:1900s establishments in Asia
title: Singha Durbar
